content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard having a smoke and looking up into the stars. at approx. 21:20 i noticed a "star" moving across the the sky heading north-west and immediately knew it was not an airplane (live near philly international), due to its very high altitude and singular light and the fact that it was slightly blinking (atmospheric interference perhaps?) 

tracked it for about 2 minutes and then noticed it came to a complete stop.  at this point, having witnessed a similar event 3 years ago, i just got too spooked and went inside.
content.summary: Star size dot moving north west stops in mid air

content.detailedDescription:
A white shiny sphere was in the  northwestsky at 7:10pm. midway traffic was flying underneath it. the object just hovered in the same spot and it would go on and off in the same spot. then it went on and stayed on and just disappeared in front of us. there was no structure, faa lights, movement, windows, noise. this was like what was seen last week except it was unpright in a standing position.

then around 8:30pm i saw a large lit up object coming through the trees in between the houses in the yardline coming from the east and heading west. this is not a typical flight pattern here. this object was very low and in the trees. then all of a sudden i saw the object bank around the tree and head back out to the east. it made no noise and it was all lit up and looked white/red/gold. moments after that it was odd because a huge commerical jet liner flew right over the house very, very low like 600 feet. it shook the house. not usual flight pattern either, planes were flying out over the home.

then around 9:20pm i was out on the back patio and saw again this very bright light coming from the house yard tree line. coming from the east low into the trees. it was dark out now and the light was very bright coming from the trees. i heard no noise and came out from the outside patio with my camera and looked up and there was this very bright light almost looked trianglur flying overhead low about 300/400 feet. the object then as it flew over me seemed to transform into a long thread, almost like a snake or a slinky with nothing in the middle. this body looked red with on each end of it was green/gold triangular lights
as it went over the tree it looked like it was diving down into the ground with the rest of the back of this object following it. the movements was very slinky like. there was no noise, no faa lights,windows, markings, nothing. it was a very odd experience and object.
content.summary: Shiny white sphere returns and low flying object slinky like with lit triangles on ends

content.detailedDescription: Me and two freinds were leaving another freinds house at around 3am, as i waited outside for for them i glanced up at the sky, it was a fairly clear night and i was looking at the stars when i noticed what appeared to be a star with a slight wobble. as we started walking home i asked my freinds if they thought that anything was strange about the star and it now appeared to be shaking quite vigourously. as we watched we realised that it was much too close to be a star and was a bright white light, it stopped shaking and seemed to be coming in our direction. it now seemed to slow down and moved like a balloon in a slight breeze bobbing gently around. it remained completly silent and though it is difficult to judge the distance accuratly it seemed to be very close maybe 200 metres away when it stopped dead still and remained still for approx 30 secs no real shape could be made out it just looked like a star.I was still wondering what it was and one of my freinds became nervous and suggested we head for home when it began to slowly move off to our right. it appeared to be gently bobbing around as it did so it then stopped perfectly still and remained still for approx 10 secounds. it then moved off again but it seemed surreal because it did not seem to accelerate but went from dead still to moving at a fairly quick constant pace in an instant. it was not bobbing now but moving in a straight line. as it got further away though still clearly visable it stopped still for a few secounds and what looked like a white light/beam shot out of the bottom left side of the object causing a small white flash in the sky a short distance from the object. the object then moved off and upward at a very fast speed and was gone from sight in a few secounds all three of us where amazed by what we saw and the object made no sound at all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Silent white light ,variable speeds

content.detailedDescription:
Hello friends about 21:00 hours yesterday when the car parked in the town of sant andreu de llavaneres (barcelona - spain), i saw a strange object that at first i felt it was an airplane.
it was a bright white light, north-easterly direction, i had seen for several seconds, but never saw any flashing. the surprise was that when bright light is shut down into a small yellow light and disappeared into the vastness of the sky.


hola amigos ayer sobre las 21:00 horas cuando aparcaba el coche en la poblaci���n de sant andreu de llavaneras, vi un extra���o objeto que en un primer momento cre��� que era un avi���n.
era una luz brillante blanca, direcci���n nordeste, que consegu��� ver durante varios segundos, pero en ning���n momento vi ninguna luz intermitente. la sorpresa fue cuando esa luz brillante, se apag��� para convertirse en una luz peque���a amarillenta y desapareci��� en la inmensidad del cielo.
content.summary: Circle white

content.detailedDescription:
On viewing a new sighting report in springfield, illinois, i was struck with how similar the description is to our sighting and wanted the witness there to be sure to see our video. originally reported to ufocasebook.Com:

i was awakened this morning about 5:40 am here in west houston by my 17 year old daughter who was up early for school. she was sitting eating breakfast and happened to notice a strange light out the back window. she said she watched it, got her sister (15), and witnessed three distinct groups of lights hovering over the rooftops in the distance. they said they could see a dark object in the center of one, but two were just hovering as changing colored lights (at different heights).
that's when they woke me. i ran outside to see and confirmed two of these objects. at an arm's length i'd say they were about the size of an aspirin or peanut. fairly large and distinct with 4 or 5 lights making up a cross or diamond shape. the lights were pulsating and changing colors: red, green, blue, white, turquoise.

i went in to get my astronomical telescope to see if i could zero in on it. while i was trying to sight it, the one i was watching reduced size, turned orange and began to move to my right. i followed it around to the front of my house and watched it slowly move parallel to the ground just above the rooftops until it disappeared behind some homes.

the other light was gone when i looked back.

my daughter tried to film it, but could not get it focused. however, you can see the two objects and the colors that they were cycling through.

we have been watching news and internet but have seen no other reports, except in researching, i came across a description of a sighting the same day, 12 hours later in british columbia.

we don't know, of course, what it was, but the two objects i saw were silent.

about twenty minutes later, i went back outside and saw an aircraft approaching from a different part of the horizon and could clearly hear that it was a helicopter. so i use that in contrast to the silence of the first sighting.

update-03-09-08-the gentleman who took the video below has sent additional information about the video:

anyway, the two lower lights are normal. the white light is a porch light on someone���s home a few hundred yards away and the yellow light is a street lamp. the two upper, out of focus, but changing color, orbs are the sightings. again, these were each made up of several lights in a kind of x pattern. we could clearly see them but when she was filming she didn���t realize that the leaves of a palm were throwing off the focus of the camera.

we are kicking ourselves we didn���t take more shots outside. in the moment we were mesmerized and didn���t want to take our eyes off them. they were incredible! and i know that there is lots of air traffic in this area, but i���ve never ever seen anything like these lights before...
content.summary: 2 groups of 5 lights each, rapidly changing colors

content.detailedDescription: My daughter in law (jessica) and myself were going to the truck stop on highway 31 in peru, in. as soon as we left the house we saw what appeared to be a plane but brighter above eel river road.  as we started to turn right onto 600, off of eel river road, we noticed the the light was not moving.  jessica was driving and i was in the back seat with my grandson.  she slowed the vehicle down in order to get a better look at the object that was just above tree-line.  the object then came closer to our vehicle (around 700 feet from us).  jessica stopped the vhicle and as she did the object also stopped.  we were very excited and decided to go back home to get my son so that he could video tape it.  as we turned the vehicle around and started back on eel river rd., the object changed from a bright light to a triangular shaped object with two moving things attached to the back.  these things looked like the part on the back of an oil rig and moved in similiar fashion.  as we drove toward our home the ojbect moved off with us and stayed just above tree-line but followed us back to our house.  as we turned onto our road the object sped up faster than i have ever seen any plane go (there was no noise or other planes around during this) and disappeared behind my neighbor's home.  we ran in and told my son and his friend about what we witnessed.  they got the video camera and went outside.  my grandson was teething and needed tylenol so jessica and i got back into the vehicle and once again headed to the truck stop.  we decided to go down eel river rd and turn towards 31 on mexico rd.  as we approached 31, we again saw the same object hovering on our left right beside 31.  i told jessica to flash the vehicle lights.  as she did, the object appeared to responded and moved slightly as if to say (oh, there they are!) neither jessica or i remember going across the first two lanes of 31 but the next thing we knew we were in the intersection and there were cars coming at us from all directions.  we were almost hit in the front and in the back of our vehicle.  we turne left on 31 and continued to the truck stop.  the object was still hovering in the field beside 31 and as we proceeded in 31 it continued to stay with us.  if jessica slowed the vehicle the object got brighter and also slowed down.  during the time it was following beside us, it changed shapes many times.  at one point it became an oval shaped object and moved up in the sky a bit and we were able to see under it. directly in the center, underneath the object, it was very bright and looked like electrical currents or small lighting bolts.  the ojbect stayed with us until we got to the traffic light to turn left at the truck stop.  as we stopped at the light, the object slowed down and moved in front of us about 700 or 800 feet away and then another light appeared next to it.  when our light turned green and we turned into the truck stop both objects disappeared.  during the sighting we were not afraid.  we felt as though whatever this thing was, it was trying to communicate with us in some way.  we also felt confused and disoriented even on the trip home.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo followed our vehicle on highway 31

content.detailedDescription: We were taking my god-daughter to frances slocum's burial site and then to the battleground.  as we were crossing the bridge over the miss. reservoir a we started witnessing lights right above the treetops.  the weather was clear and there were absolutely no planes in the area that we could see or hear.  as we started crossing the bridge we noticed lights that formed a triangle.  we had been videoing historical places all afternoon so we had our video camera with us.  my son started filming.  we saw the lights appear and then disappear and then again form a triangle and move off to the left horizontally and then down below the treetops.  then the object simply disappeared.  as soon as we get the proper cord to download the video to the computer i will upload to mufon.  we told mufon investigator tim wagner about this incident via telephone.
content.summary: Triangluar shaped ufo missessenewa reservoir

content.detailedDescription:
Iwas walking east up fleet st in baltimore when i glanced at the sky and thought i saw a falling star. it came out of the north east. after decending it flattened out parallel with the ground and came straight towards my direction. what first caught my eye was that the front of this thing was glowing a bluish green semi circle light pattern. the best way to describe it would be like a tip of an axe head lit up in neon. the object passed almost above me and there were no noise at all. that is the second weird thing because down at patterson park we have aircraft from planes to helicopters everyday and you can hear them all, this thing nothing. when it passed over my head heading now sw i could see to especially bright lights on either side come to view, possibly engines of some type but they did not leave any vapor trail or anything. and lastly this thing was only about a couple of hundred yards off of the ground. 

no idea what it was but i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Object flying ne to sw direction over patterson park towards harbor

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight (aug 21-2008) at 7:53 pm and last night at 7:55pm i saw the same odd thing and feel as though i must report it in case it shows up again tomorrow night as i think it will.

      i was on lone mountain street (north las vegas, nv) looking west at the mountains when suddenly a light appeared right where i was looking. it was about two finger widths (held at arms length) above the mountaintops. it then moved so slowly it was hard to perceive that it was moving but for the relative position of the mountains. it took 9 minutes to go two finger widths and behind the mountains. it did not take a straight path; it descended towards the mountains almost straight down but beared just a little to the right. then it went to the right along the top of the mountains then behind the mountain  (the distance it traveled to the right along the top of the mountain was about as big as your fingernail is wide held at arms length) it moved very very slowly. it seemed to move at a constant speed. it did appear to brighten and dim a little but stayed pretty much the same brightness the whole time. i stepped out my front door and looked at it with my binoculars and it looked like a bright white disc shaped object that had no strobe. there are a lot of planes around here but i would not post this if i thought there was any chance of it being a plane. the object is easy to see, it is very bright and has showed up the last two nights within five minutes of each other. anywhere north of craig road could see it very well but you could probably see it from most places even farther south since it first appears a little above the mountains, look between 7:50-7:58pm. i will post tomorrow if it shows again but i���m hoping someone else will read this and look for it too.
content.summary: Bright white, disc shaped light moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: While stationed at scofield army base, hawaii,1991 a large gold disc was seen by 7 members of a re-con sqaud on patrol.   approx. 20 yard diameter gold disc shaped object was sitting in a lava field from 3 - 6am.  then it slowly started to float away from the lava tube and shot up at a 45 degree angle away from witnesses and was gone.
content.summary: Large gold disc in lava fields

content.detailedDescription: My grandmother and i were sitting on the patio when these lights moving so fast in the sky and were bright like started moving around, they were moving so fast that there was no way that these were planes or any aircraft.
content.summary: It was weird it was like a group of lights moving so fast!

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in seat 1a on a flight from wichitia, ks to memphis, tn. the plane was a canadair regional jet, entering the landing pattern in memphis airspace. we were west of the mississippi river, in the general area of west memphis, arkansas. i noticed a bright light from ahead of the plane at about the 11 oclock position. i could not tell what it was, but it looked as if it was reflecting the sunlight from a highly polished surface. it did not seem to be moving, but i did not see it for any length of time. i keep my digital camera with me when i fly because some of the best things i have seen were from the window of an airliner. i tried to zoom in on the object, but could not find it in my screen, so i backed out the zoom fully and took the picture.  the plane then banked left to it's final approach to memphis from the south, and i lost sight of it. when i got home, i checked the pic on my computer and it is there, but the reflection is very diminished. from the picture, it looks like the object is on the arkansas side of the river, across from tunica, ms. i know the area somewhat, and am not familiar with any building which would have this appearance, since the object appears to be below the horizon in the picture. if you zoom into the picture, look on the right side, about halfway down. unfortunately, the weather did not allow for the horizon to be distinguishable, so i can not tell an accurate size or distance.
content.summary: Sphere sighted from airline

content.detailedDescription:
When i saw these, i had no idea what they were, but i didn't think they were alien because the lights seemed earthly.  but other than that, they seemed very alien.  3 black triangles with white lights flew very low, so low that i remember seeing a black brushed metal texture on the underside of the craft, as well as some slight faceting (it wasn't all smooth).  they were about as large in the sky as an airplane coming in for a landing at an airport, but there was no airport. imagine the diameter of a frisbee just a few feet above over your head.  there was a slight hum, like the sound of an airplane if it had its engines off or something.  it was much more quiet than i thought possible.

at the time, i didn't know about the f-117 nighthawk.  however, as the craft were leaving i could see engines of some sort on the back and they were glowing bright white (but no beads, just a glow).   but, my research on the f-117 tells me that the engines would not be visible!  since it is stealth, the engines are ducted.  and, the f-117 is not a perfect triangle from the bottom, although it looks that way as it approaches you.  these were triangular. also, the f-117 is designed for speed, not slow flying over populated areas.  and, as if that weren't enough, as it was leaving i remember seeing two vertical tail fins, around the engines - the f-117s are slanted from the middle.  so, it looked more like what an "aurora" is supposed to.  but they fly fast!

why would three f-117's fly over the upper west side of santa cruz at 5am, under radar, and at extremely slow speeds?  this was around the time of the gulf war, but i don't know why they would be scrambled in california either.

i am still looking for answers...
content.summary: 3 black triangles with white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Aug 20th 2008

to start this report off  , i must say it consists of the entire evening of sightings.
starting at about 5 pm and lasting until around 10 pm when i had to go to work.
me  a friend and my kids where sitting outside just talking, then we hear a jet , so we start looking for it, but we seen nothing  of the sorts instead
we saw a small whitish colored sphere  and it went up into the clouds. shortly after what seemed to b f 16's started flying through, again hearing the jet sounds.
not to long after we went on about what we were doing, outdoors still. my 14 yr old daughter saw a huge helicopter, she yelled at to look, but she describes 
it as being huge, and flying fast. but we didnt even hear it, if it was that close i thought we should have heard it. she described it as being drk in color  brown/ black .
i thought it was odd.
and that was just the beginning of our night of sightings.
the rest of the evening fighter jets kept making rounds. in pairs of 2 and 3..
after the activity started up again, i went in and got my video recorder, and started recording every craft. that came  close..
one  craft i recorded close to 10 pm was a very large triangle shaped craft, i believe it to be a possible stealth craft of some sorts as it was very low  flying.
and make absolutely no sound.. i have a very good video of this. it had first 2 lights on each side and 1 flashing and one strobe , as it got directly over head of us the 
flashing light became solid so that it appeared triangular. and the strobe continued.. it was a very  very active night here. wow
i will  have my camera from now on every where i go! i swear
content.summary: Very active day and evening over cass county

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from napa valley casino in american canyon.  i was on hwy 80.  when i started to exit redtop road i noticed a large craft in the air.  i was thinking to my self that looks strange.  was it a plane flying towards me?  then i realized it was hovering in one place. i don't know a military plane that hovers except a helicopter.  i was thinking to my self i should take a picture.  then i thought about it its probably just a helicopter with two huge spot lights. i've never seen a helicopter that big with two spot lights. i couldn't tell if those spot lights were accually hitting the ground and it made no noise and didn't look like a helicopter. it was above the open field next too the high school. while i was trying too get my celphone from the cracks in between my console and drivers seat. i had too stop at the stop sign and turn right.  the ufo was huge it started too move above and the two spot lights flipped up and turned off but in an uncanny way i can't describe. then by the time i got my camera in my hand it took off so fast i saw a motion trail from the rear light and it was gone.  

it took me a while to report this because my friends and family don't believe me.  until i met someone that lives about 5 blocks down near gold hill road off of 680. this woman and her daughter we're standing outside their  house that night but she said it was late at night. waiting for her husband .  they said they saw a large ufo with two huge lights and one rear light take off faster then they could imagine a modern aircraft is capable of doing. after she spoke of this i mentioned i saw the ufo too.  i told her i would report it since i wasn't the only witness to this event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 large like spot lights and one small tail light hovering then taking off fast

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after 11pm i went to the kitchen to get a drink from fridge.  peered out the window adjacent to the fridge looking in a westerly direction when i noticed what appeared to be a distant star.  i live just outside of town and have five acres but it gets very dark out here.  i regularly look at the stars and look for shooting stars, constellations, or just the beauty of the night sky.  i am constantly watching for coons getting in my garbage and for deer which tend to come up in the yard.  anyway, as i looked out the window i noticed this "star".  it seemed to be lower than the rest.  after a short second i realized that it was changing colors.  i stared for a few moments then decided i would just step outside and take a look.  i went to my patio and watched this for several minutes.  it didn't appear to be moving just hanging there in the sky.  i was in my underwear (lol) so i decided to go back inside.  after only a minute or two my curiosity got the better of me so i put on my pjs and went back out.  there it was still hanging there changing obviously from bright red to teal to gold to green just all these different colors.  to make sure i wasn't crazy i proceeded to stare at all the other stars i could see to make sure they didn't have the same appearance.  they did not.  after several more minutes i looked around to see if there was anything else odd in the sky and couldn't see anything.  but i noticed the light had moved slightly because i had to move to a different spot on the patio to keep it in view.  i was looking over the top of a tree line adjacent to my property and had to view through a gap in the tree tops.  since it didn't seem to be going away i decided to try to get my video camera and catch a glimpse on it before something happened.  the batteries weren't charged.  i was afraid to stop looking for fear i would miss something that would dispell or prove my suspicions that this thing was out of the ordinary.  so i hurried up and went back out.  i thought i missed it but once i moved to the top of my deck in the front yard i regained sight of the light.  i watched it get dim and then bright again but not much else seemed to happen(colors were still changing).  i lit a smoke and had time to finish it probably lasted five minutes or so and the light was still there.  then it seemed to get brighter like maybe it was coming closer towards my direction.  i watched so hard i don't think i could blink.  all of the sudden, the light just seem to fizzle out and dissappear.  i am aware of the airport that is nearbye.  i have lived here the majority of my life.  when i was little i wanted to be a fighter pilot.  i know what airplanes look like.  i know about the red and green strobes at either end of the wingspan and the white light they also carry.  this wasn't a plane.  it didn't circle or cut across the sky.  i observe jets and such all the time in the night sky.  i am confident this was out of the ordinary.  although it was only about twice the size of any star in the sky the colors were unreal.  they weren't blinking or changing like one off one on.  the light almost seem to swirl or blend or whatever.  don't really know what to compare it to.  i was so excited i wanted to wake my wife but didn't want to piss her off.  i wish i had camcorded the whole thing.  i almost took a picture but i didn't think it would look like anything unless you could see the changing of the colors.  just want to know if anyone else in the springfield il area spotted the strange light.
content.summary: Color changing light

content.detailedDescription:
I become very exhausted and fell asleep by 5 pm.  i awakened at 7pm to fall asleep again at 8pm.  around 3am awakened to feel what i thought was cat claws on my feet.  i found myself unable to move my head to look.  ifelt paralize and felt an odd aura.  i was laying on my side, and watched a small man enter my room from that position.  he w3as holding a light tp the cieling.  i lost conscieness.  i awkened to what felt like a womaan tucking me in.  then fell back to sleep.  i first thought it was my wife.  she said it wasn't, and that she had wslept real deep. 
     i thought the little man was my son.
content.summary: Visitation

content.detailedDescription:
I become very exhausted and fell asleep by 5 pm.  i awakened at 7pm to fall asleep again at 8pm.  around 3am awakened to feel what i thought was cat claws on my feet.  i found myself unable to move my head to look.  ifelt paralize and felt an odd aura.  i was laying on my side, and watched a small man enter my room from that position.  he w3as holding a light tp the cieling.  i lost conscieness.  i awkened to what felt like a womaan tucking me in.  then fell back to sleep.  i first thought it was my wife.  she said it wasn't, and that she had wslept real deep. 
     i thought the little man was my son.
content.summary: Visitation

content.detailedDescription:
I took this picture in my sons backyard, it is an airplane landing at mc carran airport in las vegas, please tell me how those circles under the plane can form even if they are the landing ligthts?
thank you.
content.summary: Airplane

content.detailedDescription: There were no blinking lights just one solid light.  the brightness of the object made me notice it. i was coming home from dinner with my mom and dad.  they live 3 miles away to the east. the light went perfectly straight and just dimmed. i went for binoculars and object was not in the area it should have been when i returned. father saw the same object from his house and said it just dimmed. i called cleveland and columbus airports. they had no information on light. the object moved north to south and the sky was clear. the object was at about 30k' in the sky.  bright star with no running lights. no sound was audible. girlfriend also witnessed. another girl by dad also witnessed. girl unknown. not a satellite. saw a satellite later. noticed an airliner crossing in objects path.
content.summary: Light moves in a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were driving back from arkansas late yesterday evening, passing through harrisonburg, louisiana at 11:45 p.M.  we were a few minutes past harrisonburg heading south towards manifest when we saw two bright white lights flashing to the left of the highway.  there were two bright white lights,  one above the other which appeared to be hovering approximately 50 feet above the ground.  we discussed briefly that it must be a radio tower, however we have never seen a radio tower in this area and one with lights so bright.
i continued to drive south, towards the lights for several minutes and when we were parallel to the lights we felt a gush of wind around the car that we not only felt in the car but could hear. i focused on the road and hit the acelerator and my sister, the passenger, said she had seen smaller red flashing lights near the bottom flashing light when we were closer to the object.   i was going about 80 mph and we could still see the lights for another 5 to 6 miles.  
when we safely arrived at our grandmother's house, i called the sheriff's department to ask if there had been any other reports or if there was military testing in the area.  i was told that they didn't know anything about it. 
we were both frightened at the intensity of the lights and the gush of wind this object created.  obvisiously we were too frightened to stop and photograph the event and were trying to get as far away as quickly as possible.
content.summary: Two piercing bright white lights that were flashing about 50 feet from the ground with smaller red flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Four or five bright, teardrop or comet  shapes moved in and out and around a cloud high in the eastern sky at at approximately 3:00a.M.On august 14th, 2008. when they stopped in mid-air, they hung there. i witnessed the scene at a tall window at home with my daughter, whom i awakened from a deep sleep. she witnessed the objects from the same window.  

i was looking for planes and stars. there were no planes. the stars were faint. i saw these objects darting around a cloud and coming to a complete halt in mid-air. some hung like long cigars. some were like boxes.  

i thought the objects were ufo objects. they were silent.

i thought the scene was fascinating. my daughter thought it was beautiful.

i thought it was odd that the objects stayed within the window's width, although they seemed at least twenty miles out and about a thousand miles up.

we got too tired to watch anymore and went to bed.
content.summary: Objects moved quiclky in the eastern sky on august 8th, 2008

content.detailedDescription:
I have a rooftop deck that looks over the city. on the nights of august 16 and 17 between 10:00 and 10 :30, i saw on three separate  occasions, 2 small white objects fly from out of the west and head out east towards lake michigan. my wife was present too.We observed them both times for over a minute, probably two minutes in duration.  they came from out west between midway and ohare airport and travelled east. we first thought they were satellites, but they were too low, probably 200-300 feet above my four story condo.  they were silent, they definitely were not birds or balloons, because they moved against the wind and traveled out and up towards the east. they we reminded me of the unmanned reconnaissance  vehicles,  not out of this world ufo's.  i saw them twice on the 16, and once on the 17th.  they always traveled in pairs, then slowly spread apart as they headed out towards the lake.  this occurred on the weekend of the recent airshow, but there was no airshow going on at this time of night. the show ended at 4pm.  my wife thought they looked circular with a squarish top, kind of like a graduation cap.  i only saw circular shapes.  there was no sound, no light, no jet stream or exhaust.  at first, they looked like small balloons, but they were traveling against a lake breeze.  they looked no larger than 4-5 ft in diameter from my viewpoint, but they could have been larger.  the sky was lit up due to the city lights and  because of a bright signpost from across my stree at our local menards. i cant help but think that this could be related to the airshows that went on between the 14th and 17th, but this sighting occurred almost 6 hours after the show  was over.  were my wife and  i  the only one to see this?

we were out on our deck grilling out late at night. we were looking out west, watching stars and planes flying overhead. these objects were much lower than any planes that fly over our homes. we were not drinking any alcohol. we lost sight of objects as it flew out of view over lake michigan, which is twenty blocks east.

as i said, i doubt they were true ufo's, they seemed more like reconnaissance drones.  are these common in chicago?  i have never in my life witnessed anything close to a ufo, this could qualify because i could not identify it with any known aircraft that i have seen. it would be interesting to see if anybody else has seen these objects.
content.summary: Small circular white objects in night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in my living room, and went out onto the patio in my back yard to get a signal on my cell phone. i noticed sky was very clear and the moon was quite bright, and i sat down and watched the sky while i checked my voice mail on my phone. when i got up to go inside, something caught my eye in the northwest sky.  i thought it was a star at first, then i thought maybe it was mars, but then i realized it was something else, because it was rapidly changing color, and getting more and less bright.  i stood there watching it for a couple minutes trying to figure out what it was.  it was definitly not an airplane, because it stayed in the same spot, and didn't have the beacon lights, plus i could see several planes in the sky as well, all with beacon lights to compare, and they looked nothing like the object, and they weren't nearly as bright, nor did the remain stationary in the sky.  i thought maybe it was a radio tower, but i'd never seen a radio tower there before, and radio tower lights are all red, and not that bright.  then the object began to drop, very gradually, and then remained stationary again, so i knew that it wasn't radio tower.  then i went inside and got my parents, they came out and saw it as well.  my father, who is a very knowledgeable man, had no clue as to what it was, and we all agreed it was not a plane, or helicopter, because there were aircraft in the sky to compare it to and it looked nothing like them.  we tried, but the object would not show up on a digital camera, and i couldn't find binoculars to get a closer look.  about twenty minutes after i first saw it, it dropped below the tree line.  however, i could still see it flashing through the trees, until it dropped out of view behind a house.  afterwards, we were all just confused, and i sat for a while just trying to think of a logical explaination as to what it was, but i still can't come up with one.
content.summary: I went out onto my patio at around 11:30pm and saw bright star like ufo in the northwest sky

content.detailedDescription:
Tres objetos circulares brillantes se mantuvieron por unos minutos flotando sobre al centro de monterrey, nuevo le���n. eran de colores rojo y verde, pod���an ser vistos con binoculares desde la ciudad de san nicol���s de los garza. fue reportado a un canal de televisi���n pero no fue posible captar el fen���meno.

three bright circular objects were kept for a few minutes floating on the center of monterrey, nuevo leon. they were colored red and green could be seen with binoculars from the city of san nicolas de los garza. it was reported to a television channel but it was not possible to capture the phenomenon.
content.summary: Tres objetos circulares brillantes sobre monterrey.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my family room doing some work on my computer when i heard a low flying helicopter. it sounded pretty low so i grabbed my digital camera to take some pictures of it. i took several pictures of the helicopter as it was flying a bit eratic, and only about 300-500 feet elevation. i figured they may be looking for someone on foot or a vehicle. i did not notice any other objects in the sky when i was taking the pictures. later when i was showing my wife the pictures she noticed when we zoomed in on the helicopter, in every picture there was an object either around the helicopter or the helicopter facing the direction of the object(s). on one photo i was able to zoom in and see "police" on the side of the helicopter. don't know what these were but thought i would let you take a look.
content.summary: Helicopter with orbs or disc's around it.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i own a home in lower macungie township; an end unit townhouse. our back patio deck receives the light of the setting sun. our living room couch is situated against a long wall and the evening light frequently causes us to lower the blinds a bit to prevent being totally unable to see out. the time was approximately 7:20pm. i happened to glance over and noticed something odd in the sky, falling between the high tension wires of a pole out on the back road, in the direction of northwest. it appeared to be an elongated trail of smoke. i wear glasses. at the distance i calculated the phenomenon to be i did not wish to trust merely to my eye sight alone. my wife became alerted to my agitated demeanor and she secured our binoculars (wide angle 7 x,35, a very good pair)whereupon we both went out onto the deck. the glaring sunset caused no difficulty as the object was below the line of setting and i was able to see it clearly without the sun light glaring into the lenses themselves. 
what i then saw was tear shaped, with a tail of white smoke that stretched out behind it. now i must reiterate the distance was great enough that even if i had (hypothetically) leapt into my car and driven as fast as i possibly could have to where i estimated this was happening i would have never reached the spot before the incident was over. nevertheless the binoculars revealed, what appeared to me to be, a spot of flames at the center of the tear drop. the object was in steady descent(we could easily gauge it's travel by the distance between the tension wires), with jerking movments to either side. there was a fleeting instant wherein i thought i saw mass within the flaming center- however i would be reluctant to testify to that. the tail of smoke disappeared rapidly as this object descended and finally dipped below the line of trees closest to my home. i should mention that there is farm land across the road and the sighting descended below the tree break line between the fields. 
i was very excited. i wanted to call someone, but didn't know who. at this juncture it was approximately 7:30. i paced the living room, glancing outside frequently, when suddenly there appeared to be either another object- same description- or an entirely new one. this second appearance seemed to be lower than when i observed the first and i initially thought that it might be the same object and that it had somehow risen up again in a calculated u flight pattern. this notion seemed rather absurd, so i filed it away and kept watching. once again the object was into a descent. 
then, it simply disappeared, vanished. i mean the tail of smoke, the object itself and all visible traces of it's having been there, completely gone in the blink of an eye (i loathe cliches but there it is nonetheless)as i watched it occur. at this juncture the time was very nearly 8pm. the setting sun made any further observation impossible, however i would go on record as stating that the object and the sunset were initially far enough distant from one another on the horizon that there was no possibility of the two becoming one and the same and so all merely my imagination (of which i freely admit i have ample). i am relatively sure that i saw flames. i am almost positive that i saw something within the entire tear dropped smoke. 
i am 52 years old, highly intelligent and a veteran of both the marines and army. i am not prone to hysteria. i have lived here for 9 years and in the lehigh valley for 19. we see planes out here constantly as we are within the flight patterns of lvi airport. this was no plane, unless it were on fire. at one point during the second appearance there also appeared to be a plane moving fast towards the phenomenon, coming from the west. i am certain it was a plane despite the distance because of its shape in my lenses. that too simply vanished. i am more than willing to concede the debatable distance from occurence to my deck, however that was dramatically lessened by the binoculars. the occurence was visible with the naked eye (the plane wasn't), which is what first alerted me to it. however we both saw something unexplainable without further factual input (which i would greatly appreciate to be forthcoming). although we had a very decent digital camera handy, all attempts to zoom in and take photos were thwarted by the sun set glare. we even thought it might be space junk coming down, or even a small meteor, that is until we saw what we believed to be the second object (or the same one rising up and falling all over again). i would dearly appreciate some reconciliation of these sightings at your leisure. i am home all day and relatively easy to get hold of. 
                                    sincerely,
                                christopher a. lay
                                 deborah l. lay
content.summary: Unusual trail of smoke to the northwest which upon closer investigation with powerful binoculars revealed unexplainable object at the center.This was followed by erratic movements or possibly even a second object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting for the grade school doors to open and i saw something larger than the sun in the eastrn sky. i was wondering all these years if anyone else saw something.
i've looked at dozens of google page images and haven't seen anything like i remember.
content.summary: Sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday july 24, 2008
as i was heading home on i-75 south from my friend's house between 
3:40am-4:00am, a strange figure appeared in the ditch right before i approached the holly road exit. i couldn't see the body because the ditch was deep but i did see a head of what appeared to be the long eared chupacabra i saw earlier this month. the head appeared to be hopping forward (north) as i was driving south so i didn't get the best look at him. it didn't react to my vehicle. it hopped a total of three times before i passed the chupacabra really fast at 55-60mph. the grey head appeared to have long ears, big eyes and a long face looking downward. i stopped the car and veered to the side off the road and backed up to see if the chupacabra was still there. i didn't see the creature. all i could see was a local hospital situated far in the background. there were plenty of trees and bushes to hide in.
content.summary: Chupacabra back again? hopping on side of michigan expressway:

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home and unloaded the car. i went out to the yard and looked towards the west sky and saw a white glowing orb hovering in the west sky very low on the horizon. it was very low that the planes that normally come in over the tree line were coming in way below the tree line. this orb hovering and probably moved a couple feet in 5 minutes. also it had a what looked like either  a red then blue flash to it quickly. this glowing orb had no faa lights or moved like the rest of the midway traffic in the area. it also just disappeared without a trace.  i saw this orb on sunday 8/17/2008. it was glowing white in about the same place around 8:20pm in the western sky. and it too was the same in appearance and had the same charateristics. except on sunday, the planes flew over it. the timing was about the same. took pictures.
content.summary: White glowing orb hovering in west sky /2nd sighting
